text: Great mall right next to main attractions of Sentosa. Lots of places to eat and drink, and tons of candy shops. It was clean when we visited a few days ago. There are multiple entry and exit points, so didn't feel too crowded anywhere. Maybe a few more seating options on the lower floor would be useful.
They held the Van Gogh Exhibition here. A delightful place to explore and roam about.

Nice wide area with numerous food outlets- lots of different cuisines, fast food included. There‚Äôs sufficient range of outlets to cater for all budgets. Usual chain outlets are here - MacDonald‚Äôs, Texas Chicken, Din Tai Fung, BreadTalk etc etc. The area is also occasionally used for large cultural events which gives it a special ambience. Nice place for a stroll just outside the Casino area üëç

It was an awesome experience with the merge of art and technology to bring out the life of the painting.

Get yourself in the time when Van Gogh was in, from the painting, feel what he felt. Through the painting, it is easy to feel his strong emotions changing from time to time till he took his live in 1890 at the age of 37.

Hope you could get to see it, exhibition at limited time only.
Forum is a small mall that has a few cafes, boutiques and others. It's located beside voco Orchard Singapore.
